local_intent: Compute a pinch grasp pose for the grape and verify it exists, ensuring visibility first and retrying computation if needed.
assumptions: Target visibility can be achieved via scan if not immediately visible
Scene remains static during grasp pose computation
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan by perceiving grapes (IsObjectVisible/Scan+Detect), computing pinch grasp with result_key 'grasp_grape', then verifying via PoseAvailable before downstream alignment/pick.
